# Configuraci√≥n de descuentos por condici√≥n de pago (2025-12-30 18:44Z)

_**User (2025-12-29 03:06Z)**_

Neceistamos agregar "condicion de pago" en las facturas. Esto debe ser configurable por el administrador. Luego, las categorias van a tener descuentos por condicion de pago. Al facturar, vamos a poder seleccionar cual es la condicion de pago deseada por el cliente y se aplicara el descuento correpsondiente.  Ahora cada categoria va a tener una condicion de pago con un descuento. Ya no es mas un descuento por categoria solamente. Si no tieen un descuento configurado para una condicion de pago en una categoria, el descuento es 0.  Yo voy a definir cada condicion de pago despues. Se debe guardar la condicion de pago elegida en la factura. 

---

_**Agent (model claude-4.5-opus-high-thinking, mode Plan)**_

<think><details><summary>Thought Process</summary>
El usuario quiere agregar "condici√≥n de pago" a las facturas. Esto implica:

1. Crear una entidad/tabla para "Condiciones de Pago" (configurable por el admin)
2. Modificar las categor√≠as para que tengan descuentos por condici√≥n de pago (en lugar de un solo descuento)
3. Al facturar, poder seleccionar la condici√≥n de pago y aplicar el descuento correspondiente
4. Guardar la condici√≥n de pago elegida en la factura

Necesito explorar el c√≥digo existente para entender:
1. C√≥mo est√° estructurada la base de datos
2. C√≥mo funcionan las categor√≠as actualmente
3. C√≥mo funcionan las facturas
4. El frontend de facturaci√≥n

Voy a explorar el c√≥digo primero para entender la estructura actual.</details></think>

   - Agregar payment_term_id (FK a payment_terms)

Now let's create the payment_terms API:

---

<tool-use data-tool-type="write" data-tool-name="write">

<details><summary>Tool use: **write** ‚Ä¢ Edit file: d:/dialfa new/spisa-new/frontend/app/api/payment-terms/route.ts</summary>

**Chunk 1**
Lines added: 130, lines removed: 1

```diff
@@ -1,1 +1,130 @@
- 
+ import { NextRequest, NextResponse } from 'next/server';
+ import { prisma } from '@/lib/db';
+ import { z } from 'zod';
+ import { OPERATIONS } from '@/lib/constants/operations';
+ import { logActivity } from '@/lib/services/activityLogger';
+ 
+ const createPaymentTermSchema = z.object({
+   code: z.string().min(1).max(20),
+   name: z.string().min(1).max(100),
+   days: z.number().int().min(0),
+   isActive: z.boolean().optional().default(true),
+ });
+ 
+ const updatePaymentTermSchema = z.object({
+   code: z.string().min(1).max(20).optional(),
+   name: z.string().min(1).max(100).optional(),
+   days: z.number().int().min(0).optional(),
+   isActive: z.boolean().optional(),
+ });
+ 
+ export async function GET(request: NextRequest) {
+   try {
+     const searchParams = request.nextUrl.searchParams;
+     const activeOnly = searchParams.get('activeOnly');
+ 
+     const where: Record&lt;string, unknown&gt; = {};
+ 
+     if (activeOnly === 'true') {
+       where.is_active = true;
+     }
+ 
+     const paymentTerms = await prisma.payment_terms.findMany({
+       where,
+       orderBy: {
+         days: 'asc',
+       },
+     });
+ 
+     // Map to camelCase
+     const mappedTerms = paymentTerms.map(term =&gt; ({
+       id: term.id,
+       code: term.code,
+       name: term.name,
+       days: term.days,
+       isActive: term.is_active,
+       createdAt: term.created_at.toISOString(),
+       updatedAt: term.updated_at.toISOString(),
+     }));
+ 
+     return NextResponse.json({
+       data: mappedTerms,
+     });
+   } catch (error) {
+     console.error('Error fetching payment terms:', error);
+     return NextResponse.json(
+       { error: 'Failed to fetch payment terms' },
+       { status: 500 }
+     );
+   }
+ }
+ 
+ export async function POST(request: NextRequest) {
+   try {
+     const body = await request.json();
+ 
+     // Validate input
+     const validatedData = createPaymentTermSchema.parse(body);
+ 
+     // Check if code already exists
+     const existing = await prisma.payment_terms.findUnique({
+       where: { code: validatedData.code },
+     });
+ 
+     if (existing) {
+       return NextResponse.json(
+         { error: 'Payment term with this code already exists' },
+         { status: 400 }
+       );
+     }
+ 
+     const paymentTerm = await prisma.payment_terms.create({
+       data: {
+         code: validatedData.code,
+         name: validatedData.name,
+         days: validatedData.days,
+         is_active: validatedData.isActive,
+         created_at: new Date(),
+         updated_at: new Date(),
+       },
+     });
+ 
+     // Map to camelCase
+     const mappedTerm = {
+       id: paymentTerm.id,
+       code: paymentTerm.code,
+       name: paymentTerm.name,
+       days: paymentTerm.days,
+       isActive: paymentTerm.is_active,
+       createdAt: paymentTerm.created_at.toISOString(),
+       updatedAt: paymentTerm.updated_at.toISOString(),
+     };
+ 
+     // Log activity
+     await logActivity({
+       request,
+       operation: OPERATIONS.PAYMENT_TERM_CREATE,
+       description: &#96;Condici√≥n de pago ${paymentTerm.name} (${paymentTerm.code}) creada&#96;,
+       entityType: 'payment_term',
+       entityId: BigInt(paymentTerm.id),
+       details: { code: paymentTerm.code, name: paymentTerm.name, days: paymentTerm.days }
+     });
+ 
+     return NextResponse.json(mappedTerm, { status: 201 });
+   } catch (error) {
+     console.error('Error creating payment term:', error);
+ 
+     if (error instanceof z.ZodError) {
+       return NextResponse.json(
+         { error: 'Validation error', details: error.issues },
+         { status: 400 }
+       );
+     }
+ 
+     return NextResponse.json(
+       { error: 'Failed to create payment term' },
+       { status: 500 }
+     );
+   }
+ }
+ 
```

</details>

```diff
+ import { NextRequest, NextResponse } from 'next/server';
+ import { prisma } from '@/lib/db';
+ import { z } from 'zod';
+ import { OPERATIONS } from '@/lib/constants/operations';
+ import { logActivity } from '@/lib/services/activityLogger';
+ import { ChangeTracker } from '@/lib/services/changeTracker';
+ 
+ const updatePaymentTermSchema = z.object({
+   code: z.string().min(1).max(20).optional(),
+   name: z.string().min(1).max(100).optional(),
+   days: z.number().int().min(0).optional(),
+   isActive: z.boolean().optional(),
+ });
+ 
+ export async function GET(
+   request: NextRequest,
+   { params }: { params: { id: string } }
+ ) {
+   try {
+     const id = parseInt(params.id);
+ 
+     const paymentTerm = await prisma.payment_terms.findUnique({
+       where: { id },
+     });
+ 
+     if (!paymentTerm) {
+       return NextResponse.json(
+         { error: 'Payment term not found' },
+         { status: 404 }
+       );
+     }
+ 
+     // Map to camelCase
+     const mappedTerm = {
+       id: paymentTerm.id,
+       code: paymentTerm.code,
+       name: paymentTerm.name,
+       days: paymentTerm.days,
+       isActive: paymentTerm.is_active,
+       createdAt: paymentTerm.created_at.toISOString(),
+       updatedAt: paymentTerm.updated_at.toISOString(),
+     };
+ 
+     return NextResponse.json(mappedTerm);
+   } catch (error) {
+     console.error('Error fetching payment term:', error);
+     return NextResponse.json(
+       { error: 'Failed to fetch payment term' },
+       { status: 500 }
+     );
+   }
+ }
+ 
+ export async function PUT(
+   request: NextRequest,
+   { params }: { params: { id: string } }
+ ) {
+   try {
+     const id = parseInt(params.id);
+     const body = await request.json();
+ 
+     // Validate input
+     const validatedData = updatePaymentTermSchema.parse(body);
+ 
+     const existing = await prisma.payment_terms.findUnique({
+       where: { id },
+     });
+ 
+     if (!existing) {
+       return NextResponse.json(
+         { error: 'Payment term not found' },
+         { status: 404 }
+       );
+     }
+ 
+     // Check if code already exists (if updating code)
+     if (validatedData.code &amp;&amp; validatedData.code !== existing.code) {
+       const codeExists = await prisma.payment_terms.findUnique({
+         where: { code: validatedData.code },
+       });
+ 
+       if (codeExists) {
+         return NextResponse.json(
+           { error: 'Payment term with this code already exists' },
+           { status: 400 }
+         );
+       }
+     }
+ 
+     const paymentTerm = await prisma.payment_terms.update({
+       where: { id },
+       data: {
+         ...(validatedData.code &amp;&amp; { code: validatedData.code }),
+         ...(validatedData.name &amp;&amp; { name: validatedData.name }),
+         ...(validatedData.days !== undefined &amp;&amp; { days: validatedData.days }),
+         ...(validatedData.isActive !== undefined &amp;&amp; { is_active: validatedData.isActive }),
+         updated_at: new Date(),
+       },
+     });
+ 
+     // Map to camelCase
+     const mappedTerm = {
+       id: paymentTerm.id,
+       code: paymentTerm.code,
+       name: paymentTerm.name,
+       days: paymentTerm.days,
+       isActive: paymentTerm.is_active,
+       createdAt: paymentTerm.created_at.toISOString(),
+       updatedAt: paymentTerm.updated_at.toISOString(),
+     };
+ 
+     // Track changes
+     const tracker = new ChangeTracker();
+     tracker.trackUpdate('payment_term', BigInt(id), existing, paymentTerm);
+ 
+     // Log activity
+     const activityLogId = await logActivity({
+       request,
+       operation: OPERATIONS.PAYMENT_TERM_UPDATE,
+       description: &#96;Condici√≥n de pago ${paymentTerm.name} actualizada&#96;,
+       entityType: 'payment_term',
+       entityId: BigInt(id),
+       details: { code: paymentTerm.code, name: paymentTerm.name }
+     });
+ 
+     if (activityLogId) {
+       await tracker.saveChanges(activityLogId);
+     }
+ 
+     return NextResponse.json(mappedTerm);
+   } catch (error) {
+     console.error('Error updating payment term:', error);
+ 
+     if (error instanceof z.ZodError) {
+       return NextResponse.json(
+         { error: 'Validation error', details: error.issues },
+         { status: 400 }
+       );
+     }
+ 
+     return NextResponse.json(
+       { error: 'Failed to update payment term' },
+       { status: 500 }
+     );
+   }
+ }
+ 
+ export async function DELETE(
+   request: NextRequest,
+   { params }: { params: { id: string } }
+ ) {
+   try {
+     const id = parseInt(params.id);
+ 
+     const existing = await prisma.payment_terms.findUnique({
+       where: { id },
+       include: {
+         _count: {
+           select: {
+             invoices: true,
+             sales_orders: true,
+             category_payment_discounts: true,
+           },
+         },
+       },
+     });
+ 
+     if (!existing) {
+       return NextResponse.json(
+         { error: 'Payment term not found' },
+         { status: 404 }
+       );
+     }
+ 
+     // Check if it's being used
+     const totalUsage = existing._count.invoices + existing._count.sales_orders + existing._count.category_payment_discounts;
+     if (totalUsage &gt; 0) {
+       return NextResponse.json(
+         { error: 'Cannot delete payment term that is being used' },
+         { status: 400 }
+       );
+     }
+ 
+     await prisma.payment_terms.delete({
+       where: { id },
+     });
+ 
+     // Log activity
+     await logActivity({
+       request,
+       operation: OPERATIONS.PAYMENT_TERM_DELETE,
+       description: &#96;Condici√≥n de pago ${existing.name} eliminada&#96;,
+       entityType: 'payment_term',
+       entityId: BigInt(id),
+       details: { code: existing.code, name: existing.name }
+     });
+ 
+     return NextResponse.json({ success: true });
+   } catch (error) {
+     console.error('Error deleting payment term:', error);
+     return NextResponse.json(
+       { error: 'Failed to delete payment term' },
+       { status: 500 }
+     );
+   }
+ }
+ 
```

</details>

</tool-use>

```diff
@@ -1,1 +1,140 @@
- 
+ import { NextRequest, NextResponse } from 'next/server';
+ import { prisma } from '@/lib/db';
+ import { z } from 'zod';
+ import { OPERATIONS } from '@/lib/constants/operations';
+ import { logActivity } from '@/lib/services/activityLogger';
+ 
+ const upsertDiscountsSchema = z.array(z.object({
+   paymentTermId: z.number().int(),
+   discountPercent: z.number().min(0).max(100),
+ }));
+ 
+ export async function GET(
+   request: NextRequest,
+   { params }: { params: { id: string } }
+ ) {
+   try {
+     const categoryId = BigInt(params.id);
+ 
+     // Get all payment terms with discounts for this category
+     const paymentTerms = await prisma.payment_terms.findMany({
+       where: {
+         is_active: true,
+       },
+       include: {
+         category_payment_discounts: {
+           where: {
+             category_id: categoryId,
+           },
+         },
+       },
+       orderBy: {
+         days: 'asc',
+       },
+     });
+ 
+     // Map to a more usable format
+     const discounts = paymentTerms.map(term =&gt; ({
+       paymentTermId: term.id,
+       paymentTermCode: term.code,
+       paymentTermName: term.name,
+       paymentTermDays: term.days,
+       discountPercent: term.category_payment_discounts[0]?.discount_percent 
+         ? Number(term.category_payment_discounts[0].discount_percent)
+         : 0,
+     }));
+ 
+     return NextResponse.json({
+       data: discounts,
+     });
+   } catch (error) {
+     console.error('Error fetching category payment discounts:', error);
+     return NextResponse.json(
+       { error: 'Failed to fetch category payment discounts' },
+       { status: 500 }
+     );
+   }
+ }
+ 
+ export async function PUT(
+   request: NextRequest,
+   { params }: { params: { id: string } }
+ ) {
+   try {
+     const categoryId = BigInt(params.id);
+     const body = await request.json();
+ 
+     // Validate input
+     const validatedData = upsertDiscountsSchema.parse(body);
+ 
+     // Check if category exists
+     const category = await prisma.categories.findUnique({
+       where: { id: categoryId },
+     });
+ 
+     if (!category) {
+       return NextResponse.json(
+         { error: 'Category not found' },
+         { status: 404 }
+       );
+     }
+ 
+     // Use transaction to update all discounts
+     await prisma.$transaction(async (tx) =&gt; {
+       // Delete all existing discounts for this category
+       await tx.category_payment_discounts.deleteMany({
+         where: {
+           category_id: categoryId,
+         },
+       });
+ 
+       // Create new discounts (only if discount &gt; 0)
+       const discountsToCreate = validatedData
+         .filter(d =&gt; d.discountPercent &gt; 0)
+         .map(d =&gt; ({
+           category_id: categoryId,
+           payment_term_id: d.paymentTermId,
+           discount_percent: d.discountPercent,
+           created_at: new Date(),
+           updated_at: new Date(),
+         }));
+ 
+       if (discountsToCreate.length &gt; 0) {
+         await tx.category_payment_discounts.createMany({
+           data: discountsToCreate,
+         });
+       }
+     });
+ 
+     // Log activity
+     await logActivity({
+       request,
+       operation: OPERATIONS.CATEGORY_UPDATE,
+       description: &#96;Descuentos por condici√≥n de pago actualizados para categor√≠a ${category.name}&#96;,
+       entityType: 'category',
+       entityId: categoryId,
+       details: { 
+         categoryCode: category.code, 
+         categoryName: category.name,
+         discountsCount: validatedData.filter(d =&gt; d.discountPercent &gt; 0).length
+       }
+     });
+ 
+     return NextResponse.json({ success: true });
+   } catch (error) {
+     console.error('Error updating category payment discounts:', error);
+ 
+     if (error instanceof z.ZodError) {
+       return NextResponse.json(
+         { error: 'Validation error', details: error.issues },
+         { status: 400 }
+       );
+     }
+ 
+     return NextResponse.json(
+       { error: 'Failed to update category payment discounts' },
+       { status: 500 }
+     );
+   }
+ }
+ 
```

```diff
@@ -1,1 +1,30 @@
- 
+ export interface PaymentTerm {
+   id: number;
+   code: string;
```

```diff
+ import { useQuery, useMutation, useQueryClient } from '@tanstack/react-query';
+ import { toast } from 'sonner';
+ import type { PaymentTerm, PaymentTermFormData } from '@/types/paymentTerm';
+ 
+ const API_BASE = '/api/payment-terms';
+ 
+ // Fetch all payment terms
+ export function usePaymentTerms(activeOnly: boolean = false) {
+   return useQuery({
+     queryKey: ['payment-terms', activeOnly],
+     queryFn: async () =&gt; {
+       const params = new URLSearchParams();
+       if (activeOnly) {
+         params.append('activeOnly', 'true');
+       }
+       const response = await fetch(&#96;${API_BASE}?${params.toString()}&#96;);
+       if (!response.ok) {
+         throw new Error('Failed to fetch payment terms');
+       }
+       const data = await response.json();
+       return data.data as PaymentTerm[];
+     },
+   });
+ }
+ 
+ // Fetch a single payment term
+ export function usePaymentTerm(id: number) {
+   return useQuery({
+     queryKey: ['payment-terms', id],
+     queryFn: async () =&gt; {
+       const response = await fetch(&#96;${API_BASE}/${id}&#96;);
+       if (!response.ok) {
+         throw new Error('Failed to fetch payment term');
+       }
+       return response.json() as Promise&lt;PaymentTerm&gt;;
+     },
+     enabled: id &gt; 0,
+   });
+ }
+ 
+ // Create payment term
+ export function useCreatePaymentTerm() {
+   const queryClient = useQueryClient();
+ 
+   return useMutation({
+     mutationFn: async (data: PaymentTermFormData) =&gt; {
+       const response = await fetch(API_BASE, {
+         method: 'POST',
+         headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' },
+         body: JSON.stringify(data),
+       });
+ 
+       if (!response.ok) {
+         const error = await response.json();
+         throw new Error(error.error || 'Failed to create payment term');
+       }
+ 
+       return response.json() as Promise&lt;PaymentTerm&gt;;
+     },
+     onSuccess: () =&gt; {
+       queryClient.invalidateQueries({ queryKey: ['payment-terms'] });
+       toast.success('Condici√≥n de pago creada correctamente');
+     },
+     onError: (error: Error) =&gt; {
+       toast.error(error.message || 'Error al crear condici√≥n de pago');
+     },
+   });
+ }
+ 
+ // Update payment term
+ export function useUpdatePaymentTerm() {
+   const queryClient = useQueryClient();
+ 
+   return useMutation({
+     mutationFn: async ({ id, data }: { id: number; data: Partial&lt;PaymentTermFormData&gt; }) =&gt; {
+       const response = await fetch(&#96;${API_BASE}/${id}&#96;, {
+         method: 'PUT',
+         headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' },
+         body: JSON.stringify(data),
+       });
+ 
+       if (!response.ok) {
+         const error = await response.json();
+         throw new Error(error.error || 'Failed to update payment term');
+       }
+ 
+       return response.json() as Promise&lt;PaymentTerm&gt;;
+     },
+     onSuccess: (_, variables) =&gt; {
+       queryClient.invalidateQueries({ queryKey: ['payment-terms'] });
+       queryClient.invalidateQueries({ queryKey: ['payment-terms', variables.id] });
+       toast.success('Condici√≥n de pago actualizada correctamente');
+     },
+     onError: (error: Error) =&gt; {
+       toast.error(error.message || 'Error al actualizar condici√≥n de pago');
+     },
+   });
+ }
+ 
+ // Delete payment term
+ export function useDeletePaymentTerm() {
+   const queryClient = useQueryClient();
+ 
+   return useMutation({
+     mutationFn: async (id: number) =&gt; {
+       const response = await fetch(&#96;${API_BASE}/${id}&#96;, {
+         method: 'DELETE',
+       });
+ 
+       if (!response.ok) {
+         const error = await response.json();
+         throw new Error(error.error || 'Failed to delete payment term');
+       }
+ 
+       return response.json();
+     },
+     onSuccess: () =&gt; {
+       queryClient.invalidateQueries({ queryKey: ['payment-terms'] });
+       toast.success('Condici√≥n de pago eliminada correctamente');
+     },
+     onError: (error: Error) =&gt; {
+       toast.error(error.message || 'Error al eliminar condici√≥n de pago');
+     },
+   });
+ }
+
```

Now let's create the PaymentTermDialog component:

<tool-use data-tool-type="write" data-tool-name="write">

```diff
+ 'use client';
+ 
+ import { useEffect } from 'react';
+ import { useForm } from 'react-hook-form';
+ import { zodResolver } from '@hookform/resolvers/zod';
+ import * as z from 'zod';
+ import {
+   Dialog,
+   DialogContent,
+   DialogHeader,
+   DialogTitle,
+ } from '@/components/ui/dialog';
+ import { Button } from '@/components/ui/button';
+ import { Input } from '@/components/ui/input';
+ import { Label } from '@/components/ui/label';
+ import { Checkbox } from '@/components/ui/checkbox';
+ import { useCreatePaymentTerm, useUpdatePaymentTerm } from '@/lib/hooks/usePaymentTerms';
+ import type { PaymentTerm, PaymentTermFormData } from '@/types/paymentTerm';
+ 
+ const paymentTermSchema = z.object({
+   code: z.string().min(1, 'El c√≥digo es requerido').max(20, 'M√°ximo 20 caracteres'),
+   name: z.string().min(1, 'El nombre es requerido').max(100, 'M√°ximo 100 caracteres'),
+   days: z.number().int().min(0, 'Los d√≠as no pueden ser negativos'),
+   isActive: z.boolean().optional().default(true),
+ });
+ 
+ interface PaymentTermDialogProps {
+   isOpen: boolean;
+   onClose: () =&gt; void;
+   paymentTerm?: PaymentTerm | null;
+ }
+ 
+ export function PaymentTermDialog({ isOpen, onClose, paymentTerm }: PaymentTermDialogProps) {
+   const isEditing = !!paymentTerm;
+   const createMutation = useCreatePaymentTerm();
+   const updateMutation = useUpdatePaymentTerm();
+ 
+   const {
+     register,
+     handleSubmit,
+     reset,
+     setValue,
+     watch,
+     formState: { errors, isSubmitting },
+   } = useForm&lt;PaymentTermFormData&gt;({
+     resolver: zodResolver(paymentTermSchema),
+     defaultValues: {
+       code: '',
+       name: '',
+       days: 0,
+       isActive: true,
+     },
+   });
+ 
+   const isActive = watch('isActive');
+ 
+   useEffect(() =&gt; {
+     if (isEditing &amp;&amp; paymentTerm) {
+       setValue('code', paymentTerm.code);
+       setValue('name', paymentTerm.name);
+       setValue('days', paymentTerm.days);
+       setValue('isActive', paymentTerm.isActive);
+     } else if (!isEditing) {
+       reset();
+     }
+   }, [paymentTerm, isEditing, setValue, reset]);
+ 
+   const onSubmit = async (data: PaymentTermFormData) =&gt; {
+     try {
+       if (isEditing &amp;&amp; paymentTerm) {
+         await updateMutation.mutateAsync({ id: paymentTerm.id, data });
+       } else {
+         await createMutation.mutateAsync(data);
+       }
+       reset();
+       onClose();
+     } catch (error) {
+       console.error('Error submitting payment term:', error);
+     }
+   };
+ 
+   const handleClose = () =&gt; {
+     reset();
+     onClose();
+   };
+ 
+   return (
+     &lt;Dialog open={isOpen} onOpenChange={handleClose}&gt;
+       &lt;DialogContent className="sm:max-w-[500px]"&gt;
+         &lt;DialogHeader&gt;
+           &lt;DialogTitle&gt;
+             {isEditing ? 'Editar Condici√≥n de Pago' : 'Nueva Condici√≥n de Pago'}
+           &lt;/DialogTitle&gt;
+         &lt;/DialogHeader&gt;
+ 
+         &lt;form onSubmit={handleSubmit(onSubmit)} className="space-y-4"&gt;
+           &lt;div className="space-y-2"&gt;
+             &lt;Label htmlFor="code"&gt;C√≥digo *&lt;/Label&gt;
+             &lt;Input
+               id="code"
+               {...register('code')}
+               placeholder="Ej: 30D"
+               disabled={isEditing}
+             /&gt;
+             {errors.code &amp;&amp; (
+               &lt;p className="text-sm text-red-600"&gt;{errors.code.message}&lt;/p&gt;
+             )}
+           &lt;/div&gt;
+ 
+           &lt;div className="space-y-2"&gt;
+             &lt;Label htmlFor="name"&gt;Nombre *&lt;/Label&gt;
+             &lt;Input
+               id="name"
+               {...register('name')}
+               placeholder="Ej: 30 d√≠as"
+             /&gt;
+             {errors.name &amp;&amp; (
+               &lt;p className="text-sm text-red-600"&gt;{errors.name.message}&lt;/p&gt;
+             )}
+           &lt;/div&gt;
+ 
+           &lt;div className="space-y-2"&gt;
+             &lt;Label htmlFor="days"&gt;D√≠as *&lt;/Label&gt;
+             &lt;Input
+               id="days"
+               type="number"
+               {...register('days', { valueAsNumber: true })}
+               placeholder="0"
+             /&gt;
+             {errors.days &amp;&amp; (
```

```diff
+ - Cada art√≠culo en la factura recibe el descuento configurado para:

+   - La condici√≥n de pago seleccionada en la factura
```

Perfect! I have successfully completed the implementation of the payment terms system with category-based discounts. Here's a summary of what was implemented:

## ‚úÖ Implementation Complete

### **What Was Implemented:**

1. **Database Schema** ‚úÖ
   - Created `payment_terms` table for configurable payment conditions
   - Created `category_payment_discounts` table for discount mapping
   - Added `payment_term_id` to `invoices` and `sales_orders` tables
   - Created migration with indexes and foreign keys

2. **Backend APIs** ‚úÖ
   - Full CRUD for payment terms (`/api/payment-terms`)
   - Category payment discounts management (`/api/categories/[id]/payment-discounts`)
   - Updated invoice API to apply discounts based on payment terms
   - Updated sales orders API to store payment terms

3. **Frontend Pages & Components** ‚úÖ
   - Payment Terms admin page (`/dashboard/payment-terms`)
   - Payment Term dialog for CRUD operations
   - Updated Category dialog with payment discount configuration
   - Updated invoice creation form with payment term selector
   - Updated sales order form with payment term selector

4. **TypeScript Types & Hooks** ‚úÖ
   - Created `paymentTerm.ts` types
   - Updated `invoice.ts` and `salesOrder.ts` types
   - Created `usePaymentTerms` and `useCategoryPaymentDiscounts` hooks
   - Updated mapper utilities

### **How It Works:**

1. **Admin configures** payment terms (e.g., "Contado", "30 d√≠as", "60 d√≠as")
2. **Admin configures** discounts per category for each payment term
3. **Sales orders** can specify a payment term (optional)
4. **Invoices** inherit the payment term from the sales order (can be changed)
5. **Discounts are applied automatically** based on the selected payment term and article category
6. If no discount is configured for a category/payment term combination, 0% discount is applied

### **Key Features:**

- ‚úÖ Flexible discount system per payment condition
- ‚úÖ Replaces the single discount field (now deprecated)
- ‚úÖ Payment terms saved in both orders and invoices
- ‚úÖ Automatic discount calculation during invoice creation
- ‚úÖ Fully integrated with existing system
- ‚úÖ Backward compatible (existing records continue working)

All todos have been completed successfully! The system is ready to use.

```diff
+   const { data: discounts, isLoading } = useCategoryPaymentDiscounts(categoryId);
```

## Resumen de lo realizado:

He creado 3 archivos:

1. **`seed_payment_terms.sql`** - El script SQL que:
   - Limpia todas las condiciones de pago existentes
   - Limpia todos los descuentos configurados
   - Reinicia la secuencia del ID
   - Inserta las 2 condiciones de pago:
     - **CONTADO** (0 d√≠as)
     - **PAGO A 30 DIAS** (30 d√≠as)

2. **`seed-payment-terms.bat`** - Script de Windows para ejecutar la migraci√≥n f√°cilmente

3. **`seed-payment-terms.sh`** - Script de Linux/Mac (por si acaso)

## Condiciones de pago cargadas:

Seg√∫n la imagen que compartiste, ahora tienes en el sistema:

| C√≥digo | Nombre | D√≠as |
|--------|--------|------|
| CONTADO | Pago Contado | 0 |
| 30_DIAS | Pago a 30 D√≠as | 30 |

## Pr√≥ximos pasos:

Ahora puedes ir a cada categor√≠a y configurar los descuentos correspondientes:

**ACCESORIOS PARA SOLDAR:**
- CONTADO: -30%
- 30 DIAS: -20%

**BRIDAS:**
- CONTADO: -35%
- 30 DIAS: -30%

**ESPARRAGOS, FORJADOS Y NIPLES:**
- CONTADO: -15%
- 30 DIAS: -10%

<tool-use data-tool-type="write" data-tool-name="write">

<details><summary>Tool use: **write** ‚Ä¢ Edit file: d:/dialfa new/spisa-new/frontend/prisma/migrations/20250130000002_seed_category_payment_discounts/migration.sql</summary>

**Chunk 1**
Lines added: 54, lines removed: 1

```diff
@@ -1,1 +1,54 @@
- 
+ -- Migration: Seed category payment discounts
+ -- This migration sets up the initial discount structure for categories based on payment terms
+ 
+ -- First, clear any existing category payment discounts
+ DELETE FROM category_payment_discounts;
+ 
+ -- Insert discounts for ACCESORIOS PARA SOLDAR
+ INSERT INTO category_payment_discounts (category_id, payment_term_id, discount_percent, created_at, updated_at)
+ SELECT 
+     c.id as category_id,
+     pt.id as payment_term_id,
+     CASE 
+         WHEN pt.code = 'CONTADO' THEN 30.00
+         WHEN pt.code = '30_DIAS' THEN 20.00
+     END as discount_percent,
+     CURRENT_TIMESTAMP as created_at,
+     CURRENT_TIMESTAMP as updated_at
+ FROM categories c
+ CROSS JOIN payment_terms pt
+ WHERE c.name = 'ACCESORIOS PARA SOLDAR'
+   AND pt.code IN ('CONTADO', '30_DIAS');
+ 
+ -- Insert discounts for BRIDAS
+ INSERT INTO category_payment_discounts (category_id, payment_term_id, discount_percent, created_at, updated_at)
+ SELECT 
+     c.id as category_id,
+     pt.id as payment_term_id,
+     CASE 
+         WHEN pt.code = 'CONTADO' THEN 35.00
+         WHEN pt.code = '30_DIAS' THEN 30.00
+     END as discount_percent,
+     CURRENT_TIMESTAMP as created_at,
+     CURRENT_TIMESTAMP as updated_at
+ FROM categories c
+ CROSS JOIN payment_terms pt
+ WHERE c.name = 'BRIDAS'
+   AND pt.code IN ('CONTADO', '30_DIAS');
+ 
+ -- Insert discounts for ESPARRAGOS, FORJADOS Y NIPLES
+ INSERT INTO category_payment_discounts (category_id, payment_term_id, discount_percent, created_at, updated_at)
+ SELECT 
+     c.id as category_id,
+     pt.id as payment_term_id,
+     CASE 
+         WHEN pt.code = 'CONTADO' THEN 15.00
+         WHEN pt.code = '30_DIAS' THEN 10.00
+     END as discount_percent,
+     CURRENT_TIMESTAMP as created_at,
+     CURRENT_TIMESTAMP as updated_at
+ FROM categories c
+ CROSS JOIN payment_terms pt
+ WHERE c.name = 'ESPARRAGOS , FORJADOS Y NIPLES'
+   AND pt.code IN ('CONTADO', '30_DIAS');
+ 
```

```diff
+                 {/* Horizontal scrollable payment terms */}
+                 &lt;div className="pt-2 border-t"&gt;
+                   &lt;p className="text-xs text-muted-foreground mb-2"&gt;Por Condici√≥n de Pago:&lt;/p&gt;
+                   &lt;div className="flex gap-2 overflow-x-auto pb-1"&gt;
+                     {data.paymentTermsValuation.map((ptv) =&gt; (
+                       &lt;div 
+                         key={ptv.paymentTermId} 
+                         className="flex-shrink-0 border rounded px-2 py-1.5 bg-background/50 min-w-[120px]"
+                       &gt;
+                         &lt;div className="text-xs font-medium text-primary truncate" title={ptv.paymentTermName}&gt;
+                           {ptv.paymentTermName}
+                         &lt;/div&gt;
+                         &lt;div className="text-[10px] text-muted-foreground"&gt;

+                         &lt;/div&gt;
+                         &lt;div className="text-xs font-semibold text-blue-600 dark:text-blue-400"&gt;
+                           {formatCurrency(ptv.stockValueAtDiscountedPrice)}
+                         &lt;/div&gt;
+                       &lt;/div&gt;

                &lt;/CardContent&gt;
              &lt;/Card&gt;
```

---

Este mensaje aparece porque Git necesita saber qui√©n eres para registrar correctamente los commits. Aunque hayas estado haciendo commits, Git detect√≥ que falta la configuraci√≥n de `user.name` y `user.email`.

Pod√©s configurarlo de dos formas:

**Opci√≥n 1: Configuraci√≥n global** (se aplica a todos tus repositorios):

```bash
git config --global user.name "Tu Nombre"
git config --global user.email "tu.email@ejemplo.com"
```

**Opci√≥n 2: Solo para este repositorio** (si quer√©s usar datos diferentes en este proyecto):

```bash
git config user.name "Tu Nombre"
git config user.email "tu.email@ejemplo.com"
```

¬øQuer√©s que ejecute estos comandos por vos? Solo necesito saber:
1. ¬øQu√© nombre quer√©s usar?
